welcome.name: Welcome

botAccount.name: How to create a bot account

tokens.name: How to get your personal tokens
tokens.content:
# How to get your Tokens
- First you will have to go to [dogehouse.tv](dogehouse.tv), and right click anywhere and press inspect.

- Second you will have to go to application tab

- Thrid you will have to go to local storage and both your token and refresh-token will be there.

createBotAccount.name: Create bot account

welcomer.name: Room greeting

music.name: Music

params.name: options.autoReconnect
params.description: Whether moonstone should auto reconnect automatically

params.name: options.connectionTimeout
params.description: How long in milliseconds to wait for an answer from the server

params.name: options.callbackTimeout
params.description: How long in milliseconds to wait for a fetch reply from the server.

params.name: options.logUnhandledPackets
params.description: Log packets that aren't handled by the event listener (debug).

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Attempts to connect to Dogehouse

methods.name: getTopRooms
methods.description: Get the top dashboard rooms

methods.name: joinRoom
methods.description: Joins a room

methods.name: createRoom
methods.description: Creates a room

methods.name: createBotAccount
methods.description: Creates a bot account

methods.name: setRole
methods.description: Sets a user's role in the current room.

params.name: role
params.description: The role to set the user as (raised_hand/listener/speaker)

params.name: user
params.description: The user to set the role on, defaults to self.

methods.name: sendChatMessage
methods.description: Sends a chat message in the current room.

params.name: whisperedTo
params.description: A list of users to whisper the message to

methods.name: setSpeaking
methods.description: Sets whether the bot is speaking or not (red circle around picture)

params.name: value
params.description: Whether the bot is speaking or not.

methods.name: setUserAuthLevel
methods.description: Sets a user's auth level

params.name: user
params.description: The user to apply the change on

methods.name: editSelf
methods.description: Edits properties of the user

events.name: ready
events.description: Fired when the connection is established

events.name: newTokens
events.description: Fired when new auth tokens are sent by the server.

events.name: joinedRoom
events.description: Fired when the bot joins a room.

events.name: userJoinRoom
events.description: Fired when a user joins the room the bot is in.

events.name: userLeftRoom
events.description: Fired when a user leaves the room the bot is in.

events.name: activeSpeakerChange
events.description: Fired when a user starts or stops speaking

events.name: muteChange
events.description: Fired when a user mutes or unmutes their microphone.

events.name: deafenChange
events.description: Fired when a user deafens or undeafens their headphones.

events.name: newChatMsg
events.description: Fired when a new chat message is received.

events.name: joinAsPeer
events.description: Fired when the bot join a room as peer (listener).

events.name: joinedAsSpeaker
events.description: Fired when the bot join a room as speaker.

events.name: becameSpeaker
events.description: Fired when the bot becomes a speaker in a room.

events.name: handRaised
events.description: Fired when a user raises their hand.

events.name: speakerAdded
events.description: Fired when a user is added as a speaker.

events.name: speakerRemoved
events.description: Fired when a user is removed as a speaker.

events.name: leftRoom
events.description: Fired when the bot leaves a room.

events.name: modChange
events.description: Fired when a user's moderator permission changes.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Play an audio resource.
examples:
// Play a local audio file
connection.play('/home/hydrabolt/audio.mp3', { volume: 0.5 });

methods.name: setSpeaking
methods.description: Set the client speaking state

classes.name: VolumeInterface
classes.description: An interface class for volume transformation.

props.name: volumeEditable
props.description: Whether or not the volume of this stream is editable

props.name: volume
props.description: The current volume of the stream

props.name: volumeDecibels
props.description: The current volume of the stream in decibels

props.name: volumeLogarithmic
props.description: The current volume of the stream from a logarithmic scale

methods.name: setVolume
methods.description: Sets the volume relative to the input stream - i.e. 1 is normal, 0.5 is half, 2 is double.

params.name: volume
params.description: The volume that you want to set

methods.name: setVolumeDecibels
methods.description: Sets the volume in decibels.

methods.name: setVolumeLogarithmic
methods.description: Sets the volume so that a perceived value of 0.5 is half the perceived volume etc.

events.name: volumeChange
events.description: Emitted when the volume of this interface changes.

params.name: oldVolume
params.description: The old volume of this interface

params.name: newVolume
params.description: The new volume of this interface

classes.name: ActiveRoom
classes.description: Represents a room that you are connected to

methods.name: askToSpeak
methods.description: Sets your role as raised hand

methods.name: sendChatMessage
methods.description: Sends a chat message

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects to the room's audio server

classes.name: ActiveUser
classes.description: Represents a user who is connected to the same room as you

methods.name: sendWhisper
methods.description: Sends a whisper to the user

methods.name: setAsListener
methods.description: Sets the user's role as listener

methods.name: setAsSpeaker
methods.description: Sets the user's role as speaker

methods.name: setAuthLevel
methods.description: Sets the user's auth status

params.name: baseObject
params.description: The base class for all items

params.name: limit
params.description: Max number of items to hold

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update an object

params.name: extra
params.description: An extra parameter the constructor may need

params.name: replace
params.description: Whether to replace an existing object with the same ID

methods.name: add
methods.description: Add an object

params.name: extra
params.description: An extra parameter the constructor may need

params.name: replace
params.description: Whether to replace an existing object with the same ID

returns.description: The existing or newly created object

methods.name: every
methods.description: Returns true if all elements satisfy the condition

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true or false

returns.description: Whether or not all elements satisfied the condition

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Return all the objects that make the function evaluate true

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true if it matches

returns.description: An array containing all the objects that matched

methods.name: find
methods.description: Return the first object to make the function evaluate true

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true if it matches

returns.description: The first matching object, or undefined if no match

methods.name: map
methods.description: Return an array with the results of applying the given function to each element

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns something

methods.name: random
methods.description: Get a random object from the Collection

returns.description: The random object, or undefined if there is no match

methods.name: reduce
methods.description: Returns a value resulting from applying a function to every element of the collection

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes the previous value and the next item and returns a new value

params.name: initialValue
params.description: The initial value passed to the function

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Remove an object

returns.description: The removed object, or null if nothing was removed

methods.name: some
methods.description: Returns true if at least one element satisfies the condition

params.name: func
params.description: A function that takes an object and returns true or false

returns.description: Whether or not at least one element satisfied the condition
